headline.main: FIGHT FOR FREEDOM NAMES SPECIAL GROUP; Advice to Be Given on Events Having French Parallel

lead_paragraph: Fight for Freedom, Inc., announced yesterday the formation of an advisory board of seven to advise it concerning events in France that might have a parallel in the United States.
abstract: Fight for Freedom Inc forms French consultative group
snippet: Fight for Freedom, Inc., announced yesterday the formation of an advisory board of seven to advise it concerning events in France that might have a parallel in the United States....
